general.title: General
general.credentialsAlert: All credentials must be configured on sales channel level.
general.doubleoptinAlert: Lists are set to double opt-in by default in all Klaviyo accounts. Be careful that you do not have double opt-in enabled in Shopware and Klaviyo at the same time!

initialization.label: Initialize Klaviyo After First Interaction With Page.
initialization.helpText: After the client starts interacting with the page, the Klaviyo scripts will be initialized. On subsequent page transitions, the scripts will be initialized immediately.

enabled.label: Enable Account
enabled.helpText: By switching this toggle you can enable/disable configured Klaviyo account on current sales-channel.

privateApiKey.label: Klaviyo Private API key
privateApiKey.helpText: Klaviyo Private API key. You can find it in your Klaviyo account

publicApiKey.label: Klaviyo Public API key
publicApiKey.helpText: Klaviyo Public API key. You can find it in your Klaviyo account

klaviyoListForSubscribersSync.label: Klaviyo List name for subscribers sync
klaviyoListForSubscribersSync.helpText:
The name of the Subscribers list in Klaviyo where all Shopware 6 subscribers will be added.
 In case of duplicate names first found list will be used

bisVariantField.label: Back in stock variant field mapping

orderIdentification.label: Order identification field mapping
orderIdentification.helpText: Select order identification variable that will be send to Klaviyo

trackDeletedAccountOrders.label: Track Deleted Account's Orders
trackDeletedAccountOrders.helpText: Do we need to synchronize deleted customer's order events to Klaviyo? Note: When this feature is enabled, duplicate Klaviyo profiles may be synchronized.

trackViewedProduct.label: Track Viewed Product
trackViewedProduct.helpText: Do we need to send "Viewed Product" Event to Klaviyo?

trackRecentlyViewedItems.label: Track Recently Viewed Items
trackRecentlyViewedItems.helpText: Do we need to send "Recently Viewed Items" Event to Klaviyo?

trackAddedToCart.label: Track Added to Cart
trackAddedToCart.helpText:
Do we need to send "Added to Cart Event" to Klaviyo?
Decision will also affect Synchronization of the historical events

trackStartedCheckout.label: Track Started Checkout
trackStartedCheckout.helpText:
Do we need to send "Started Checkout Event" to Klaviyo?
Decision will also affect Synchronization of the historical events

trackPlacedOrder.label: Track Placed Order
trackPlacedOrder.helpText:
Do we need to send "Placed Order Event" to Klaviyo?
Decision will also affect Synchronization of the historical events

trackOrderedProduct.label: Track Ordered Product
trackOrderedProduct.helpText:
Do we need to send "Ordered Product Event" to Klaviyo?
Decision will also affect Synchronization of the historical events

trackFulfilledOrder.label: Track Fulfilled Order
trackFulfilledOrder.helpText:
Do we need to send "Fulfilled Order Event" to Klaviyo?
Decision will also affect Synchronization of the historical events

trackCancelledOrder.label: Track Cancelled Order
trackCancelledOrder.helpText:
Do we need to send "Cancelled Order Event" to Klaviyo?
Decision will also affect Synchronization of the historical events

trackRefundedOrder.label: Track Refunded Order
trackRefundedOrder.helpText:
Do we need to send "Refunded Order Event" to Klaviyo?
Decision will also affect Synchronization of the historical events

trackPaidOrder.label: Track Paid Order
trackPaidOrder.helpText:
Do we need to send "Paid Order Event" to Klaviyo?
Decision will also affect Synchronization of the historical events

trackShippedOrder.label: Track Shipped Order
trackShippedOrder.helpText:
Do we need to send "Shipped Order Event" to Klaviyo?
Decision will also affect Synchronization of the historical events

trackSubscribedToBackInStock.label: Track Back In Stock
trackSubscribedToBackInStock.helpText: Do we need to send "Back In Stock Event" to Klaviyo?

oldJobCleanup.label: Enable cleanup of old jobs
oldJobCleanup.helpText: Enables cleaning up old jobs in the Klaviyo job listing

enableDailySynchronization.label: Enable Daily Subscribers Synchronization
enableDailySynchronization.helpText: This option allows you to enable daily scheduled synchronization of subscribers

timeDailySynchronization.label: Time for Daily Subscribers Synchronization
timeDailySynchronization.helpText: The option specifies at which time to sync daily subscribers synchronization

fieldMapping.noMappingFieldsError: There are no customer custom fields for mapping.

get_synchronization_status.failed: Failed to get Last Subscribers synchronization status
Failed to get Last Historical Events Tracking synchronization status

schedule_synchronization.failed: Historical events synchronization failed to schedule
schedule_synchronization.is_running: Historical events synchronization is already running
schedule_synchronization.is_scheduled: Historical events synchronization is already scheduled
